entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, McBride
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023
